name: Oddish

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move.
It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: Gloom
description:
Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor.
The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance
of 1.25 miles.

name: Bellossom
description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals
rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: Tangela
description:
Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows
nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this
Pokémon’s true appearance remains a mystery.

name: Tangrowth

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

name: Yanma
description:
Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its
head. It won’t miss prey—even those behind it.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Roselia
description:
Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance.
The stronger its aroma, the healthier
the Roselia is.

name: Roserade

attacks.name: Poisonous Whip
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
After captivating opponents with its sweet scent,
it lashes them with its thorny whips.

name: Turtwig
description:
It uses its whole body to photosynthesize when
exposed to sunlight. Its shell is made from
hardened soil.

name: Grotle
description:
It lives along water in forests. In the daytime,
it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra

attacks.name: Frenzy Plant
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Frenzy Plant.

description:
Ancient people imagined that beneath the
ground dwelt a gigantic Torterra.

name: Kricketot
description:
Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff
antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

name: Kricketune

attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

description:
By allowing its cry to resonate in the hollow of its
belly, it produces a captivating sound.

name: Burmy
description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam

attacks.name: Leaf Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
Its appearance changes depending on where it
evolved. The materials on hand become a part of
its body.

name: Combee

attacks.name: all for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random  from your deck onto your Bench.

description:
At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a
hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

name: Vespiquen
description:
It houses its colony in cells in its body and
releases various pheromones to make those
grubs do its bidding.

name: Carnivine

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then
chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Leafeon

attacks.name: Leafy Cyclone
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

description:
When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of
sunshine, you’ll know it is using photosynthesis
to produce clean air.

name: Mow Rotom

attacks.name: Energy Cutoff
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description:
The lawn mower is one of the household
appliances that led to the development of
the Rotom Dex.

name: Shaymin

ability.title: Fragrant Flower Garden
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

description:
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: Magmar

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take a [R] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description:
Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it
regrets this habit once it realizes that it has
burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

description:
When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning
in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to
over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Slugma
description:
A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers
around in a constant search for warm places.

name: Magcargo

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

description:
Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames
that circulate throughout its body.

name: Chimchar
description:
Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly.
Even rain can’t extinguish the fire.

name: Monferno
description:
It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its
tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all [R] Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Heat Rotom

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
If the convection microwave oven is not working
properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will
become lethargic.

name: Swinub
description:
It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up
food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine

ability.title: Thick Fat
ability.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks from [R] or [W] Pokémon.

description:
If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back
stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.

name: Mamoswine

ability.title: Thick Fat
ability.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from [R] or [W] Pokémon.

description:
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings
from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a
while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

name: Regice

ability.title: Crystal Body
ability.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon.

description:
With cold air that can reach temperatures as low
as −328 degrees Fahrenheit, Regice instantly
freezes any creature that approaches it.

name: Piplup

attacks.name: Nap
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
It doesn’t like to be taken care of. It’s difficult to
bond with since it won’t listen to its Trainer.

name: Prinplup
description:
It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every
one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon

attacks.name: Aqua Jet
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its
wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

name: Buizel
description:
It spins its two tails like a screw to propel itself
through water. The tails also slice clinging
seaweed.

name: Floatzel

attacks.name: Jet Screw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people
on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

name: Shellos
description:
It used to have a shell on its back long ago.
This species is closely related to Pokémon
like Shellder.

name: Gastrodon

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in
times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be
found in the mountains, far from the sea.

name: Finneon

attacks.name: Elegant Swim
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description:
The line running down its side can store sunlight.
It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description:
With its shining light, it lures its prey close.
However, the light also happens to attract
ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

name: Snover

attacks.name: Ice Shard
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a [F] Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
During cold seasons, it migrates to the
mountain’s lower reaches. It returns to the
snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description:
It lives a quiet life on mountains that are
perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself
by whipping up blizzards.

name: Glaceon

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

description:
It can control its body temperature at will.
This enables it to freeze the moisture in the
atmosphere, creating flurries of diamond dust.

name: Wash Rotom
description:
This Rotom has entered a washing machine.
It nods with satisfaction after it floods the
surrounding area.

name: Frost Rotom

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps
around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze
the area around it.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 [W] Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Manaphy

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a [W] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

description:
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond
with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Magnemite
description:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.

name: Magneton
description:
Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic
force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magnezone

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a [L] Energy from this Pokémon.

description:
As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems
to be receiving signals of unknown origin while
transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

name: Voltorb

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

description:
It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden
jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

name: Electrode
description:
The more energy it charges up, the faster
it gets. But this also makes it more likely
to explode.

name: Electabuzz

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take a [L] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

description:
Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon
around as a defense against Electabuzz that
come seeking electricity.

name: Electivire

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra [L] Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

description:
The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon
produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse.
The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

name: Shinx

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description:
The extension and contraction of its muscles
generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Luxio
description:
Strong electricity courses through the tips of
its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting
in foes.

name: Luxray

attacks.name: Volt Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all [L] Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
It can see clearly through walls to track down its
prey and seek its lost young.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Rotom

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds
of machines and take control in order to make
mischief.

name: Togepi
description:
The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said
that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
description:
They say that it will appear before kindhearted,
caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Togekiss

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does +60 damage.

description:
These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly
been seen at all.

name: Misdreavus
description:
This Pokémon startles people in the middle of
the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Ralts

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

description:
The horns on its head provide a strong power
that enables it to sense people’s emotions.

name: Kirlia
description:
It has a psychic power that enables it to distort
the space around it and see into the future.

name: Duskull
description:
If it finds bad children who won’t listen to their
parents, it will spirit them away—or so it’s said.

name: Dusclops
description:
It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them
into its empty body. What happens inside is
a mystery.

name: Dusknoir

ability.title: Shadow Void
ability.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.

description:
At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit
world, it steals people and Pokémon away.
No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

description:
It is whispered that any child who mistakes
Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could
wind up missing.

name: Drifblim
description:
Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls
burdened with regrets, silently drifting through
the dusk.

name: Uxie

attacks.name: Mind Boost
attacks.effect: Take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Mesprit or Azelf.

description:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said
that it can wipe out the memory of those who see
its eyes.

name: Mesprit

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf

attacks.name: sychic Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the
bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Giratina

ability.title: Levitate
ability.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

description:
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the
reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is
distorted and strange.

name: Cresselia

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
Shiny particles are released from its wings like a
veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Rhyhorn
description:
Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can
shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
description:
It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution.
It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Rhyperior

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

description:
It can load up to three projectiles per arm into
the holes in its hands. What launches out of those
holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

name: Gligar
description:
It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey,
it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Gliscor

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

description:
It observes prey while hanging inverted from
branches. When the chance presents itself,
it swoops!

name: Hitmontop
description:
It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high
speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Nosepass
description:
It moves less than an inch a year, but when
it’s in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the
ground in a split second.

name: Regirock

ability.title: Exoskeleton
ability.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

description:
Every bit of Regirock’s body is made of stone.
As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks
rocks to itself to repair what’s been lost.

name: Cranidos
description:
A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and
sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: Rampardos

attacks.name: Head Smash
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

description:
In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of
this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder
than steel, to make helmets.

name: Wormadam
description:
Its appearance changes depending on where it
evolved. The materials on hand become a part of
its body.

name: Riolu
description:
They communicate with one another using their
auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Lucario

ability.title: Fighting Coach
ability.effect: Attacks used by your [F] Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description:
It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to
Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those
of foes it could not otherwise see.

name: Hippopotas
description:
It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand
as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Hippowdon
description:
It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth
agape as a display of its strength.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Murkrow
description:
Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to
bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Honchkrow

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never
forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

name: Sneasel

attacks.name: ouble Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description:
This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of
darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Poochyena
description:
A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its
chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
description:
It will always obey the commands of a skilled
Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs
in ancient times.

name: Stunky
description:
It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench
spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon
away.

name: Skuntank

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from
the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

name: Spiritomb

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted
in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a
mysterious spell.

name: Skorupi
description:
After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently
for prey to come near. This Pokémon and
Sizzlipede share common descent.

name: Drapion

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This
Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead,
going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

name: Croagunk

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description:
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an
odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a
poison jab.

name: Toxicroak

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

description:
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it
weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges
out with its poisonous claws.

name: Darkrai

attacks.name: Dark Void
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

description:
It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by
causing them to experience deep,
nightmarish slumbers.

ability.title: Nightmare Aura
ability.effect: Whenever you attach a [D] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Skarmory

attacks.name: etal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
People fashion swords from Skarmory’s shed
feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element
in heraldic designs.

name: Registeel
description:
Registeel’s body is made of a strange material
that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but
also more durable than any metal.

name: Shieldon
description:
A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used
its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on
its face was plenty tough.

name: Bastiodon

ability.title: Guarded Grill
ability.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

description:
The bones of its face are huge and hard, so
they were mistaken for its spine until after this
Pokémon was successfully restored.

name: Wormadam

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

description:
Its appearance changes depending on where it
evolved. The materials on hand become a part of
its body.

name: Bronzor
description:
Ancient people believed that the pattern on
Bronzor’s back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

description:
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a
bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

name: Probopass

attacks.name: Triple Nose
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

description:
Although it can control its units known as
Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don’t
come back.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 [M] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Heatran

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Gible
description:
It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy
passes by, it leaps out and chomps them.
The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
description:
In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales.
Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient
will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Garchomp

ability.title: Reckless Shearing
ability.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

description:
It is said that when one runs at high speed,
its wings create blades of wind that can fell
nearby trees.

name: Lickitung
description:
If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and
you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in.
The itch won’t go away, either.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Eevee

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Porygon
description:
State-of-the-art technology was used to create
Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be
created via computer programming.

name: Porygon2
description:
This is a Porygon that was updated with special
data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about
many different subjects all on its own.

name: Porygon-Z

attacks.name: Buggy Beam
attacks.effect: Change the type of the next Energy that will be generated for your opponent to 1 of the following at random: [G],[R],[W],[L],[P],[F],[D], or [M].

description:
Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to
move between dimensions, but the program also
caused instability in Porygon-Z’s behavior.

name: Aipom
description:
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands
became clumsy. It makes its nest high in
the treetops.

name: Ambipom

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

description:
It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both
of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze,
that’s proof it really likes you.

name: Starly

attacks.name: Pluck
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description:
They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and
annoying.

name: Staravia
description:
Recognizing their own weakness, they always live
in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

description:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave
the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Bidoof

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.

name: Bibarel
description:
It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and
roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Buneary
description:
If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something
is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the
Pokémon is in need of care.

name: Lopunny

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings.
If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds
with superdestructive kicks.

name: Glameow

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description:
It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate.
Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Purugly

attacks.name: Interrupt
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

description:
It would claim another Pokémon’s nest as its own
if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

name: Chatot

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description:
It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them
into thinking it’s one of them. This way they won’t
attack it.

name: Fan Rotom

attacks.name: Spin Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.

description:
This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks
with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it
blows away everything around it.

name: Regigigas

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

description:
It is said to have made Pokémon that look like
itself from a special ice mountain, rocks,
and magma.

name: Skull Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic [C] Pokémon.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.This card can't retreat.

name: Armor Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic [C] Pokémon.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.This card can't retreat.

name: Pokémon Communication
effect: Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch it with a random Pokémon in your deck.

name: Giant Cape
effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Lum Berry
effect: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.

name: Cyrus
effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Team Galactic Grunt
effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.

name: Cynthia
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Volkner
effect: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 [L] Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Dawn
effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Mars
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

name: Tangrowth

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it
pleases. Recent research has shown that these
arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

name: Combee

attacks.name: all for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random  from your deck onto your Bench.

description:
At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a
hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

name: Carnivine

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then
chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Shaymin

ability.title: Fragrant Flower Garden
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

description:
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

name: Mamoswine

ability.title: Thick Fat
ability.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from [R] or [W] Pokémon.

description:
This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings
from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a
while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

name: Gastrodon

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in
times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be
found in the mountains, far from the sea.

name: Manaphy

attacks.name: Oceanic Gift
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your Benched Pokémon. For each of those Pokémon, take a [W] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon.

description:
It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond
with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Shinx

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description:
The extension and contraction of its muscles
generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

name: Rotom

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds
of machines and take control in order to make
mischief.

name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

description:
It is whispered that any child who mistakes
Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could
wind up missing.

name: Mesprit

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Giratina

ability.title: Levitate
ability.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

description:
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the
reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is
distorted and strange.

name: Cresselia

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

description:
Shiny particles are released from its wings like a
veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Rhyperior

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

description:
It can load up to three projectiles per arm into
the holes in its hands. What launches out of those
holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

name: Lucario

ability.title: Fighting Coach
ability.effect: Attacks used by your [F] Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

description:
It’s said that no foe can remain invisible to
Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those
of foes it could not otherwise see.

name: Hippopotas
description:
It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand
as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Spiritomb

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted
in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a
mysterious spell.

name: Croagunk

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description:
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an
odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a
poison jab.

name: Heatran

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Garchomp

ability.title: Reckless Shearing
ability.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

description:
It is said that when one runs at high speed,
its wings create blades of wind that can fell
nearby trees.

name: Staraptor

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

description:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave
the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

name: Bidoof

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.

name: Glameow

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

description:
It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate.
Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Regigigas

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

description:
It is said to have made Pokémon that look like
itself from a special ice mountain, rocks,
and magma.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all [R] Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dimensional Storm
attacks.effect: Discard 3 [W] Energy from this Pokémon. This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

ability.title: Nightmare Aura
ability.effect: Whenever you attach a [D] Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 [M] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.
